source_description: Rewrite the spec at docs/specs/transaction_audit_spec.md using findings from kitty-specs/002-transaction-audit/research.md and kitty-specs/002-transaction-audit/data-model.md. Key corrections: completeness tiers should be Â±1%/20%/120% (not 95%/80%), itemization uses categoryType === 'itemized' (not itemizationEnabled boolean), all monetary fields are cents-based integers.
